Author: imrevolting
Text: I can relate to this so hard. I’m a dancer too and watching myself on film can be very difficult.  We often can’t see our own beauty. Our brains actively sabotage this gift. I have body dysmorphia, especially surrounding performance. It’s like my brain is on critical overdrive, not only with how or what I’m performing, but it also seeps into criticism about my body too.  I try to focus on performing the material better and exuding stage presence, both which are more enjoyable to watch than a mediocre bag of bones.
